text: Cordia verbenacea D . C . essential oil significantly reduced TNF - α levels but not IL - 1β production in the subcutaneous tissue of the rat paw injected with carrageenan [ 112 ] . Some authors showed that from the essential oil of Cordia verbenacea , only α - humelene was able to reduce significantly the increase of TNF - α and IL - 1β levels in the subcutaneous tissue of the rat paw after LPS treatment [ 113 ] or in carrageenan - injected rats , whereas ( - ) - trans - caryophyllene diminished only TNF - α release [ 114 ] .
